name: SO vs Billing Balance
query:
SELECT
    so.name AS "Sales Order:Link/Sales Order:150",
    so.total AS "Basic SO Amount:Currency:120",

    -- Sum of submitted invoice totals for this SO
    COALESCE(SUM(si.total), 0) AS "Total Basic Invoice Amount:Currency:120",

    -- Remaining billing amount
    (so.total - COALESCE(SUM(si.total), 0)) AS "Balance Billing (Basic Amount):Currency:120"

FROM
    `tabSales Order` so

LEFT JOIN
    `tabSales Invoice` si 
        ON si.custom_sales_order = so.name
        AND si.docstatus = 1  -- Only submitted invoices

WHERE
    so.docstatus = 1  -- Only submitted sales orders

GROUP BY
    so.name, so.total
ORDER BY
    so.name;
